Class ElectronicResource

java.lang.Object
Resource
ElectronicResource
public class ElectronicResource
extends Resource
Represents an electronic resource at the library. This can be a ebook, pdf, online paper etc. It contains an array of electronic devices that can be used to access the resource and the format that the electronic resource is in, this can be a pdf, ebook ...

An electronic resource belongs to one library and can have 0 or more compatable devices.

Since:
2020-11-28
Version:
1.0
Author:
James Welsh

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addDevice​(ElectronicDevice electronicDevice)
    Adds an electronic device object to the list of compatible devices that can be used to access the electronic resource.
    java.util.ArrayList<ElectronicDevice> getCompatableDevices()
    Gets the array of compatableDevices that the ElectronicResources can be viewed on.
    java.lang.String getElectronicResourceType()
    Gets the electronicResourceType.
    void printAllDevices()
    Print the details of all devices that can be used to access the electronic resource regardless of whether they are available or not.
    void printAvailableDevices()
    Prints the details of all available devices that can be used to access the electronic resource.

    Sets the electronic resource type of the object and ensures that the type is allowed or warns the user.

    • getElectronicResourceType

      public java.lang.String getElectronicResourceType()
      Gets the electronicResourceType.
      Returns:
      the electronicResourceType string.

    • setElectronicResourceType

      public void setElectronicResourceType​(java.lang.String electronicResourceType)
      Sets the electronic resource type of the object and ensures that the type is allowed or warns the user.
      Parameters:
      electronicResourceType - the electronicResourceType to set must be an "online paper", a "pdf" or an "ebook".

    • getCompatableDevices

      public java.util.ArrayList<ElectronicDevice> getCompatableDevices()
      Gets the array of compatableDevices that the ElectronicResources can be viewed on.
      Returns:
      the compatableDevices ArrayList of ElectronicDevices.

    • printAllDevices

      public void printAllDevices()
      Print the details of all devices that can be used to access the electronic resource regardless of whether they are available or not.

    • printAvailableDevices

      public void printAvailableDevices()
      Prints the details of all available devices that can be used to access the electronic resource.

    • addDevice

      public void addDevice​(ElectronicDevice electronicDevice)
      Adds an electronic device object to the list of compatible devices that can be used to access the electronic resource.
      Parameters:
      electronicDevice - An electronic device that can be used to access the electronic resource.
